import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faLanguage } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import "./lang-selector.css" function LangSelector(props){ const [showMenu, setShowMenu] = useState(false) const handleShowMenu = (e) => { console.log("Hello World") } return(
{showMenu ?
: null}
{/* */}
) } export default LangSelector
